There are three identified representatives within the organization who have advanced knowledge around the BPCI-A program and the CMS program requirements.  This organization is also contracted with an organization to assist with regulatory adherence to CMS programming (CJR, BPCI-A) who would be able to provide additional support in the event of the need for a succession plan activation

Participation in the bundle has reinvigorated various operational and clinical committees and has served as a catalyst to build a Preferred Provider Network of SNF facilities focusing on  programming and centered on clinical guidelines and other cost and quality measures.  While all beneficiaries receive choice regarding post-acute care providers if needed, the hospital educates all patients around episodic management program and the benefits of choosing SNFs and Home Care agencies with clinical programming in place to best meet their clinical needs.
